title: The Jacket
description:
Mike unveils the inside of his jacket and it's a very strange look for him (00:00:00). ESPN's cover story on a nonbinary and transgender WNBA star (00:08:40). Michelle Beadle points out how absurd it is that Deshaun Watson just signed a monster contract with 22 allegations against him (00:24:50). Gerry has the perfect late night monologue joke (00:28:30). Mike Francesa is coming back in a few weeks with a brand new podcast (00:36:00). Mona Wales may be out of the running for our favorite porn star after her dirty feet are exposed (00:44:45). We find out who is set to play Johnny Carson in a new show (00:46:00). Running through Barstool Chicago's 2000's comedy movie draft (00:54:00).


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
